analysis.Summary: Vue component rendering a hero section for a token promotion, including logo, title, description, two call-to-action buttons, an animated grid background, and a sheen effect.
analysis.Purpose: Serve as the main hero/banner section on the landing page to introduce the Weeder Token, display localized text, and direct users to sign up or visit the marketplace.

Components.name: SectionHeroToken
Components.role: Root component that structures the hero section layout and applies styling.

Components.name: AnimatedGrid
Components.role: Imported child component rendering the animated grid background.

Components.name: router-link
Components.role: Vue Router component used for navigation buttons.

Functions.name: t
Functions.description: Translation function returned by useI18n to fetch localized strings.

Functions.name: defineProps
Functions.description: Vue composition API helper to declare and type component props.

analysis.Usage: Automatically exported via `<script setup>`; imported and placed into a landing page or parent layout like `modules/landing/components/Sections.vue` to render the hero token section.
Notes: Uses v-html to render HTML in translationsâ€”ensure content is trusted to avoid XSS.
Imports useRouter but does not currently use it (could be removed).
Relies on a global FILE_SERVER_URL for logo asset path.
SCSS defines a sheen overlay animation using keyframes and vendor-prefixed gradients.
